step.expected: The users should be able to Navigate to the login page

step.expected: The users should be able to enter valid username and password

step.content: Click on the
step.expected: The users should be able to log in successfuly

step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.expected: The user should be able to enter an invalid email and password

step.content: Click on the "login" button
step.expected: The user should not be able to log in and should be prompted with an error message

step.content: Navigate to the login page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.content: Enter an invalid email and password
step.expected: The user should be able to enter an invalid email and password

step.content: Click on the
step.expected: The user should not be able to log in and should be prompted with an error message

test.title: Verify that the user can reset password through "forgoten password"

custom.preconds: The user account does exist

step.content: Navigate to the login page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.content: Click on the "forgotten password" button
step.expected: The user should be redirected to forgot your password page

step.content: enter a valid email address and click the "Continue" button
step.expected:
A prompt would notify the user of a reset password email sent to their e-mail address.
The user should receive an email and be able to reset their password.

step.content: Navigate to the login page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.content: Click on the
step.expected: The user should be redirected to forgot your password page

step.content: enter a valid email address and click the
step.expected:
A prompt would notify the user of a reset password email sent to their e-mail address.
The user should receive an email and be able to reset their password.
step.actual: After clicking the continue button the a confirmation that the password is updated ![](index.php?/attachments/get/72247e43-77c8-4723-a3a8-1e9bf129f1a6)

test.title: Verify that the error message gets displayed in case the user leaves the username or password field blank.

step.expected: Able to navigate login page

step.content: Leave email and password fields empty
step.expected: email and password fields are empty

step.content: Click on the "Login" button
step.expected: The user should not be able to log in and should be prompted with an error message "Please enter Email and Password".

step.content: 1. Navigate to the login page
step.expected: Able to navigate login page

step.content: Leave email and password fields empty
step.expected: email and password fields are empty

step.content: Click on the
step.expected: The user should not be able to log in and should be prompted with an error message

test.title: Verify that the password entered is masked

custom.preconds: The user account exists

step.content: Navigate to the login page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.content: Enter a valid email and password and then verify that the password is masked
step.expected: The user should be able to enter a valid email and masked password

step.content: Navigate to the login page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.content: Enter a valid email and password and then verify that the password is masked
step.expected: The user should be able to enter a valid email and masked password

test.title: Verify that the user cannot perform paste in the password field

custom.preconds: The user account exists

step.content: Navigate to the login page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.content: Enter a Valid Email and paste the password on the password field
step.expected: The user should be able to enter a valid email address The user should not be able to paste into the password field

step.content: Navigate to the login page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.content: Enter a Valid Email and paste the password on the password field
step.expected: The user should be able to enter a valid email address The user should not be able to paste into the password field
step.actual: The user is able to paste password

test.title: Verify that there is a limit on the total number of unsuccessful login attempts.

custom.preconds: The user account exists

step.content: Navigate to the login page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.content: Enter a valid email
step.expected: The user should be able to enter a valid email

step.content: Enter an invalid password for the same email 5 times with a different password each time
step.expected: After the fifth attempt, the user would be restricted for 10 mins before the user can try to login again.

step.content: Navigate to the login page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the login page

step.content: Enter a valid email
step.expected: The user should be able to enter a valid email

step.content: Enter an invalid password for the same email 5 times with a different password each time
step.expected: After the fifth attempt, the user would be restricted for 10 mins before the user can try to login again.
step.actual: The user is able to attempt log in even after 5 tries with the same e-mail

test.title: Verify Successful Registration

step.content: Navigate to the registration page

step.content: Fill in the personal details and then enter a valid email and password
step.expected: User should be able to fill the personal details field along with the valis email and password

step.content: Click on "I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy" and Click on the "Continue" button
step.expected: The user should be able to register and a welcome message will appear

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: User should be able to navigate registration page

step.content: Fill in the personal details and then enter a valid email and password
step.expected: User should be able to fill the personal details field along with the valis email and password

step.content: Click on
step.expected: The user should be able to register and a welcome message will appear
step.actual: The user has verified of the newly created account but welcome message is not shown. ![](index.php?/attachments/get/382a5526-157c-404b-82ed-d18164a01b23)

test.title: Verify that the validation message gets displayed in case the user did not agree with privacy policy

custom.preconds: The user account does not exist

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate the registration page

step.content: Fill in the personal details and then enter a valid email and password
step.expected: The user should not be able to fill the personal details and enter valid email and password

step.content: Leave the "I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy" blank and Click on the "Continue" button
step.expected: The user should not be able to proceed and should be prompted with an error message to Agree with the privacy policy

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate the registration page

step.content: Fill in the personal details and then enter a valid email and password
step.expected: The user should not be able to fill the personal details and enter valid email and password

step.content: Leave the
step.expected: The user should not be able to proceed and should be prompted with an error message to Agree with the privacy policy
step.actual: The user cannot continue and a message prompt appeared to notify the user that the user should agree to the privacy policy

test.title: Verify that the validation message gets displayed in case the user leaves a required field blank

step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the registration page

step.content: Leaves all the fields blank
step.expected: All fields must be blank

step.content: Click on the "Continue" button
step.expected: The user should not be able to continue and be required to fill all the required fields

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the registration page

step.content: Leaves all the fields blank
step.expected: All fields must be blank

step.content: Click on the
step.expected: The user should not be able to continue and be required to fill all the required fields
step.actual: The user cannot continue and the blank fields turn red.

test.title: Verify that if a user tries to register an existing email then an error message should get displayed.

custom.preconds: The user account exists

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the registration page

step.content: Fill up all required fields
step.expected: The user should be able to fill up all the required field

step.content: Enter an existing email
step.expected: The user should be prompted with an error message regarding an already existing email

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the registration page

step.content: Fill up all required fields
step.expected: The user should be able to fill up all the required field

step.content: Enter an existing email
step.expected: The user should be prompted with an error message regarding an already existing email
step.actual: There are no prompt about an existing email. ![](index.php?/attachments/get/70234db2-a070-41f7-8da1-d5ef149a546f)

test.title: Verify if the user can register less than the required numbers of characters

custom.preconds: User is not registered

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the registration page

step.content: Fill in all the required field
step.expected: The user should be able to fill in all the required field

step.content: enter on the password field a characters less than four then agree to the privacy policy and click continue
step.expected: The user would not be able to proceed and the password field would display a warning message

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the registration page

step.content: Fill in all the required field
step.expected: The user should be able to fill in all the required field

step.content: enter on the password field a characters less than four then agree to the privacy policy and click continue
step.expected: The user would not be able to proceed and the password field would display a warning message
step.actual: The password field turn red and pops a message "Password must be between 4 and 20 characters!"

test.title: Verify that the password entered is masked upon registration

custom.preconds: the user is not registered

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the registration page

step.content: Fill in all the required fields including the password field
step.expected: The password entered should be masked

step.content: Navigate to the registration page
step.expected: The user should be able to navigate to the registration page

step.content: Fill in all the required fields including the password field
step.expected: The password entered should be masked

step.content: Click the
step.expected: The user should be redirected to the shopping cart page

step.content: Remove a product by clicking the
step.expected: A message would pop up and the product should be removed from the list
step.actual: The quantity decreased but there are no message confirmation

test.title: Check whether the user can add products to their wishlist.

step.expected: The desired product on the wish list should be displayed

step.content: From the homepage add any item to the wish list by clicking the heart symbol under the desired item
step.expected: A message would confirm the addition of an item to the wish list

step.content: Check if the item is added to the wish list by clicking the
step.expected: The desired product on the wish list should be displayed
step.actual: The user was able to add any product to the wish list. But the quantity of the wish list does not update immediately at the top right corner of the screen. It would only update if the page was refreshed
